title: PlanningGhcData
description: Schema of the object that contains the timetable planning data.

periods.title: Periods
periods.description: Weeks or periods with different assignments which contains the timetable.
periods.$comment: If there are no defined periods, the engine will create a single period with all the days of the timetable.

followedPeriods.title: FollowedPeriods
followedPeriods.description: It indicates whether periods or weeks consider the last day of the previous period or week as consecutive days with the first day of the following period or week.

lastDay.description: The end day of the period (included).

dayAliases.title: AliasDayList
dayAliases.description: Alias for each day of the period. It is an optional definition.

dayId.description: Identifier of the day of the week, it is unique across all weeks.

alias.description: Header to identify the day in the results table and the frame column.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: Tables of the timetable that contain sections where the class units are located.

days.title: Days
days.description: List of the days in the frame

sections.title: Sections
sections.description: Timetable cells where class units are located.

index.description: Index built into the day where the section is located.

duration.description: It indicates the duration (real or proportional) of the section in minutes.
duration.$comment: This indicates the duration of the section that the engine will use to assign class units. It can be the actual duration between check-in and check-out, or it can be a proportional time to simplify (hour, half hour, three-quarters of an hour...). The distribution of class units will be consistent with this duration.

allowed.description: It indicates if the section is available to assign.

buildings.title: Buildings
buildings.description: It contains the school or educational institution buildings.

distances.title: Distances
distances.description: Distance in minutes to another school building.

refBuilding.description: Identifier of the other building that refers to the distance.

minutes.description: Distance in minutes from the building of the referred building.

classRooms.title: ClassRooms
classRooms.description: It contains the classrooms to organize the class units.

isDedicated.description: Indicates if the classroom is of a special-dedicated type, or is it a general purpose classroom

capacity.description: The maximum number of students the classroom can hold.

frameTemplate.title: BannedFrameTemplate
frameTemplate.$comment: It is used when the element cannot have non-preferred sections.

items.title: BannedSectionPreference
items.description: Template with only banned section assignment preference.

day.description: Day of the week when the section is located.

index.description: Index built into the day where the section is located.

refBuilding.description: Building identifier where the class is located.

fullDay.description: This indicates whether the classroom should be booked all day after holding a subject.

classRoomsSets.title: ClassRoomsSets
classRoomsSets.description: A division of the classrooms, grouped by organizational characteristics or needs.

rooms.title: ClassRoomEntries
rooms.description: Classrooms identifiers which contain the group.

anonymousRooms.description: Number of non-specific defined classrooms that the group contains.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Types of tasks or activities for the teachers.

items.title: Teacher
items.description: Object with personal information and teachers' preferences.

associationIdentifier.description: Group or association of teachers who should have similar check-in and check-out times, if possible. This is useful for teachers who share transport.

overlappedAssessment.$comment: The engine only process it into account when the SourceModule is 'je'

generalSettings.title: GeneralSettings
generalSettings.description: Strict and measurable teacher's conditions for the timetable. If there are not single periods, these conditions are the default, but can be specified individually for each period in the 'periodSettings' tag.

periodSettings.title: PeriodsSettings
periodSettings.description: Strict and measurable teacher's conditions customized by week/period

refPeriod.description: Identifier of the period to which the settings affect.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: School subjects taught in the class units.

isStudentMentoring.description: It indicates whether the subject is a tutorial.

technicalTeacher.description: It indicates whether the subject is teach by technical teacher.

numStudents.description: Number of students in the group.

freeAfternoons.description: Stric number of free afternoons for the group.

notGaps.description: It indicates if the group can have gaps in its timetable.

gapsAlwaysInNonPreferred.description: This indicates whether the engine should be in the positions marked as non-preferred in the template for free intervals or gaps.

refCourse.description: Course identifier to which the group belongs.

includedGroups.description: Allows to indicate its a circunstancial group, formed by oficial groups to recibe optional or main subjects.

refTeacher.description: Id of the tutor teacher assigned to the group

refClassroom.description: Id of the classroom assigned to the group

courseSubjects.description: List of subjects assigned to the course.

numHours.description: Number of hours that this subject is taught. By default, it is 1.

messageToDepartment.description: Message that will be shown to the Department in the desiderata capture program.

isNew.description: Boolean that indicates if the Department has been newly created in the desiderata capture module.

exKey.description: Identifier of the Department in external application or academic manager.

email.description: It is an email type that is associated with the Department

refTeacher.description: Identifier of the list of teachers who are in this department

refSubjects.description: Identifier of the list of subjects who are in this department

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Definition of the teacher class units. These may be with groups of students, meetings with other teachers or complementary activities.

refMainSubject.title: RefMainSubject
refMainSubject.description: Identifier name of the main subject.

otherElementsInClassRooms.title: OtherElementsInClassRoomsList
otherElementsInClassRooms.description: List of other time elements in the classroom related to each other.

items.title: OtherElementsInClassRooms
items.description: It contains interrelated elements that are present in the session in addition to the main ones.
items.$comment: If a subject reference is not included, or of the other elements of the session (teacher and/or group), the relationship is understood by default with the corresponding main element of the session.

refSubject.title: SubjectReference
refSubject.description: Identifier name of other subject in the classroom.

refTeacher.title: TeacherReference
refTeacher.description: Identifier name of other teacher in the classroom.

refTask.title: TaskReference
refTask.description: Identifier name of the task of the other teacher.

sessionClassRooms.title: SessionClassRooms
sessionClassRooms.description: It contains the information about the classrooms for the class units. At least one classroom is required for the class units.

classRoomsToAssign.title: ClassRoomsToAssign
classRoomsToAssign.description: List of classrooms to the session. Each object in the list represent one classroom that must be assigned.

capacityPreference.description: Preference on whether the engine should assess the capacity of the classroom to allocate each class unit.

capacityType.description: It indicates whether all students in the class units should fit in each classroom, or in the amount of all classrooms.

alwaysSameClassRoom.description: Indicates if the session must be always in the same classroom the hole week or it can be given on different classrooms during the week.

sessionSettings.title: SessionSettings
sessionSettings.description: Conditions on the position of the class unit.

avoidFirstHourSessions.description: It penalises the position of the class units if more than 50% of the class units are at first hour.

avoidLastHourSessions.description: It penalises the position of the class units if more than 50% of the class units are at last hour.

avoidAssingLastHourAndFirstNextDay.description: It penalises if the last hour and the first hour of the following day match.

sameHourPreference.description: Preference over class units that coincide in the same time slot.

avoidAfternoonSessions.description: It penalises if there is more than one class unit after noon stop..

avoidAfterBreakSessions.description: It penalises if more than 50% of the class unit are after the last break of the day.

nonBreakInTheMiddleOfConsecutiveSession.description: Do not allow breaks between consecutive class units (class duration of more than one section).

nonBreakInTheMiddleOfSession.description: Do not allow breaks between class units of multiple duration (class duration of more than one section).

followedDaysPreference.description: If the class unit has more than one lesson, indicates the preference on assigning them on consecutive days.

consecutiveWeeksBorders.description: It considers the end-of-week day, and the start-of-week day, as consecutive days for 'followedDaysPreference'.

sessionRelations.title: SessionRelations
sessionRelations.description: It contains information on the relationships between this and other class units. These conditions can only apply to class units with students.

refSimultaneusGroup.title: RefSimultaneusGroup
refSimultaneusGroup.description: Identifier of the group of simultaneous class units of the subject. Indicates that the class units are to be taught at the same time as the group class units.

differentDays.title: DifferentDays
differentDays.description: Conditions on this and another class unit cannot coincide on the same day.

refSesions.title: RefSesions
refSesions.description: Sessions identifiers which class units should not be assigned on the same day.

daysSetting.description: Keep the same position each week or period for the class units.

consecutiveGroup.title: ConsecutiveGroup
consecutiveGroup.description: Contains the references of a continuous sessions group.

refSessions.title: SessionRefs
refSessions.description: List of the consecutive sessions. Must contain the sesion itself and the proper order of continuity (see 'order' property).

order.description: Indicates if the sessions must be 'ordered', 'unordered' or 'sameDay'  (it does not matter as long as they are allocated on the same day).

allowBreakBetweenSessions.description: Indicates if break between sessions is allowed to keep the relation.

nonConsecutiveSessions.title: NonConsecutiveSessions
nonConsecutiveSessions.description: Identifiers of the sessions which class units must not be consecutive. This is a strict condition.

nonSimultaneus.title: NonSimultaneus
nonSimultaneus.description: Identifiers of the sessions that they should not be assigned at the same time. It is a strict condition.

previousTo.title: PreviousTo
previousTo.description: This indicates that this class unit must be allocated on a previous day to the class units in the list. This is a strict condition.

afterTo.title: AfterTo
afterTo.description: This indicates that this class unit must be allocated on a subsequent day to the class units in the list. This is a strict condition.

maximumSeparationTo.title: MaximumSeparationTo
maximumSeparationTo.description: It contains class units to be taught within a maximum number of days of the current class units.

items.title: MaximumSeparationToSession
items.description: It contains the session identifier of the class unit to be taught with a number of days in between, and maximum days.

minimumSeparationTo.title: MinimumSeparationTo
minimumSeparationTo.description: It contains class units that must be taught at least a minimum number of days apart from the current class unit. .

items.title: MinimumSeparationToSession
items.description: It contains session identifier of the class unit to be taught with a number of days apart, and the minimum days.

days.description: Days of separation condition. If the value is 0 or 1 it is equivalent to the condition 'DifferentDays'.

department.description: Contains the reference of the department of the session.

meetings.title: Meetings
meetings.description: List of meetings between teachers defined in the timetable.

items.title: Meeting
items.$comment: It is incompatible set at same time refClassRoomToAssign and refBuilding.

refTeachers.title: RefTeachers
refTeachers.description: List of teachers who in the service.

refBuilding.description: Building identifier of the building where the class unit takes place. This is used to know the moving time and the number of moves between buildings for teachers without specifying a classroom.
refBuilding.$comment: It is incompatible with the other properties of 'sessionClassRooms' object.

complementaryActivities.title: ComplementaryActivities
complementaryActivities.description: List of complementary activities of the teachers.

items.title: Complementary
items.$comment: It is incompatible set at same time refClassRoomToAssign and refBuilding.

refBuilding.description: Building identifier of the building where the class unit takes place. This is used to know the moving time and the number of moves between buildings for teachers without specifying a classroom.
refBuilding.$comment: It is incompatible with the other properties of 'sessionClassRooms' object.

onCallServices.title: OnCallServices
onCallServices.description: List of on-call services of teachers defined in the timetable.

items.title: OnCallService
items.description: On-call service of teachers who supervise the free time of students.
items.$comment: Property 'refPeriods' is required if there are more than one period in the timetable.

id.$comment: This identifier can not be equals to any session identifier.

refFrame.description: Identifier of the frame where the service will be set.

refPeriods.title: RefPeriods
refPeriods.description: List of Periods when the service must be set.

inBreak.description: It indicates whether it is a break supervision.

teachersEachSection.title: TeachersEachSection
teachersEachSection.description: Information about number of teacher in all sections.
teachersEachSection.$comment: The value 'byDefault' shall be used for all sections, if the field 'bySection' is not informed. This value is also used when a section is not informed in 'bySection'.

byDefault.description: Default value for number of teacher in all sections.

bySection.title: TeachersBySections
bySection.description: Custom number of teachers in each section.

items.title: TeachersBySection
items.description: Custom number of teachers in one timetable section.

numTeachers.description: Custom number of teachers to be assigned in the section.

refTeachers.title: RefTeachersOnCall
refTeachers.description: List of teachers who in the service.

items.title: RefTeacher
items.description: It contains a teacher reference and the number of section oversight .

numOfSections.description: Number of on-call services to be done weekly by the teacher.

refBuilding.description: Identifier of the building where the service is located. It is used to know the transfer time and the number of transfers between buildings for teachers.

optimizationWeights.title: OptimizationWeights
optimizationWeights.description: This indicates the weights that the weighting options will have for the engine optimisation process. The engine shall apply default values for elements that have not been specified.

timetableGaps.title: TimetableGaps
timetableGaps.description: It contains options related to timetable-gaps weights.

groupGaps.description: It indicates the weight given to the fact of leaving gaps in groups' timetables.

teacherGaps.description: It indicates the weight given to the fact of leaving gaps in teachers' timetables.

nonPreferredPositions.title: NonPreferredPositionsOptimization
nonPreferredPositions.description: It contains options related to allocation in non-preferred sections.

inGroups.description: It indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a group.

inTeachers.description: It indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a teacher.

inSubjectsAndTask.description: It indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a subject or a task.

inSessions.description: Indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a session.

sessions.title: SessionsOptimization
sessions.description: It contains options related to optimisable conditions for sessions.

nonPreferredClassRoom.description: It indicates the weight if the class units are configured with a preferred classroom and with a set of alternative classrooms, the weight placed in one of the alternative classrooms will be penalised.

samePositionEveryPeriod.description: It indicates the weight of placing the entities of a class unit belonging to several periods in the same positions or not (also affects on-call services).

consecutiveDays.description: It indicates the weight of the condition that has been set in each case on the properties of each class unit to place two or three class units, that is, all of them on consecutive days.

bordersTimetable.description: It indicates the weight of the class units assigned at the ends of the timetable.

afternoonOrAfterBreakClasses.description: It indicates the weight of the penalty of having class units after the last break or in the afternoon.

sameHourSessionClasses.description: It indicates the weight of the penalty for not complying with the preference allocation on consecutive days.

classRoomsChanges.description: It indicates the weight of all class units of each subject not taught in the same classroom, and also to avoid classroom changes of groups. This means a change of classrooms of a group only between consecutive intervals, not those divided by a break.

teachers.title: TeachersOptimization
teachers.description: It contains options related to optimisable conditions for teachers.

teacherIncompatibities.description: It indicates the weight of the teacher's incompatibilities that can be optimised.

uniformDailyDistribution.description: It indicates the weight of placing a teacher's class units in a non-uniform way during the week.

excessContinuousTeaching.description: It indicates the weight of placing more continuous class units than those declared in the settings.

excessPermanence.description: It indicates the weight of assigning more daily or weekly stay than the declared in the settings.

continuousSessionsWithGroup.description: It indicates the weight of having consecutive class units taught to the same group.

onCallSectionsOnBorders.description: It indicates the weight of the teacher being assigned an on-call hour within the limits of his or her timetable, thus trying to fit it into the gaps in his or her class units.

teacherOrder.description: It indicates the weight of the teacher order not being assigned with a preference besides other teachers.

teacherBalance.description: It indicates whether the optimiser should balance the timetables of different teachers, to avoid very bad timetables for a particular teacher.

countGapsAroundMidday.description: It indicates, in the case of a split day (with a noon pause), that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units should be counted. This option affects the weighting in the teacher's optimisation of the gaps in their timetable.

conditionType.title: ConditionType
conditionType.description: Indicate whether the incompatibility is strict, avoid (penalisable in optimisation) or ignored.

conditionTypeWithTime.title: ConditionTypeWithTime
conditionTypeWithTime.description: Indicate condition with time wich can be strict, avoid (penalisable in optimisation) or ignored.

minutes.description: Custom time in minutes for condition.

conditionOcupancy.title: ConditionOcupancy
conditionOcupancy.description: Indicates the condition type, the total minutes, the variation with the asisted time and if the ocupancy also takes the free days or not

minutes.description: Custom total time in minutes for the ocupancy.

isAssisted.description: Indicates if the field is assigned manualy or with the assisted mode

variationTime.description: time in minutes you add to the assisted time so you generate the total time

frameTemplate.title: FrameTemplate
frameTemplate.description: Templates with frame sections assignment preferences.

items.title: SectionPreference
items.description: Template with a section assignment preference.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

type.title: SectionPreferenceTypeWithOutPreset
type.description: Element availability to be assigned to the section.

day.description: Day of the week when the section is located.

index.description: Index built into the day where the section is located.

type.title: SectionPreferenceTypeWithPreset
type.description: Session availability to be assigned to the section.

onCallServiceframeTemplate.title: OnCallTemplate
onCallServiceframeTemplate.description: Template with teacher's preferences in the on-call service.

items.title: OnCallSectionPreference
items.description: Template with a teacher section assignment preference about the service.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

type.title: SectionPreferenceTypeBannedPreset
type.description: Teacher availability to be assigned to the section.

weeklyStay.title: WeeklyStay
weeklyStay.description: It indicates the maximum preferential and strict teacher's stay, for the weekly stay that the teacher can be in the academic institution.

strict.description: Strict time in minutes of maximum weekly stay.

preferable.description: Ponderable Time in minutes of maximum weeekly stay.

countAroundMidday.description: It indicates, in the case of split shifts, that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units are counted each day.

dailyStay.title: DailyStay
dailyStay.description: This indicates the maximum preferential and strict time of stay of the teacher, for the daily stay that the teacher can be in the educational institution.

strict.description: Strict time in minutes of maximum daily stay.

preferable.description: Ponderable Time in minutes of maximum daily stay.

countAroundMidday.description: It indicates, in the case of split shifts, that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units are counted each day.

avoidGapsBetweenSesions.description: It indicates whether gaps between class units for the teacher should be avoided. This is a weighting condition.
avoidGapsBetweenSesions.$comment: If did not specify, the engine will assign a true value.

maxContinuousTeaching.title: MaxContinuousTeaching
maxContinuousTeaching.description: It indicates the maximum continuous time of class units, which are allowed without having a gap or a non-class units between them.

minutes.description: Maximum continuous teaching time in minutes.

minBreak.description: Minimum time period to be considered as break time
minBreak.$comment: If not specified, the engine will assign the general value or the default time of 30 minutes.

avoidClassesAroundBreak.description: It indicates whether the existence of class units on both sides of a playground supervision taught by this teacher will be penalised or forbidden.

freeTimes.title: FreeTimes
freeTimes.description: It contains the free time spaces that the teacher must have.

fullDay.title: FullDaysFreeTimes
fullDay.description: Teacher's full days of free time.

strictDays.description: Number of strict days when teacher should be free.

preferredDays.description: Number of preferred days when teacher should be free.

firstMinutes.title: FirstMinutesFreeTimes
firstMinutes.description: Teacher's free intervals at the beginning of the day.

strictDays.description: Strict number of days on which the teacher must have the interval free at the beginning of the day.

preferredDays.description: Preferred number of days on which the teacher should have the interval free at the beginning of the day.

minutes.description: Minutes of free time at the beginning of the day.

lastMinutes.title: LastMinutesFreeTimes
lastMinutes.description: Teacher's free intervals at the end of the day.

strictDays.description: Strict number of days on which the teacher must have the interval free at the end of the day.

preferredDays.description: Preferred number of days on which the teacher should have the interval free at the end of the day. .

minutes.description: Minutes of free time at the end of the day.

consecutiveAnyTime.title: ConsecutiveAnyTimeFreeTimes
consecutiveAnyTime.description: Teacher's free intervals at any time of the day.

strictDays.description: Strict number of days on which the teacher must have the interval free.

preferredDays.description: Preferred number of days on which the teacher should have the interval free.

strict.description: Strict number of mornings or afternoons indistinctly off.

preferable.description: Preferable number of mornings or afternoons indistinctly off.

incompatibilities.title: Incompatibilities
incompatibilities.description: It contains the teacher's incompatibilities on the allocation of class units and rest periods.

freeTimeBetweenDayBeforeAndCurrent.title: FreeTimeBetweenDays
freeTimeBetweenDayBeforeAndCurrent.description: Minutes between departure and arrival of the following day.

freeTimeBetweenEndWeekAndStartWeekDays.title: FreeTimeBetweenWeeksBorders
freeTimeBetweenEndWeekAndStartWeekDays.description: Minutes between the end time of the last day of the week and the start time of the following week.

freeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay.title: FreeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay
freeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay.description: Minutes of free time at first or last hours of the day.

doNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSectionIfStart.title: DoNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSection
doNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSectionIfStart.description: o not finish at the last hour of the evening and start at the first.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStarted.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSection
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStarted.description: Do not start at the first hour and finish at the last hour of the morning.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAt.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAtFirstAfternoon
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAt.description: Do not finish at the last hour of the morning and start at the first hour of the evening.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfte.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfternoon
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfte.description: Do not finish at the last hour in the morning and have the evening busy.

doNotStartAtFirstMorningSectionIfHasAfte.title: DoNotStartAtFirstMorningSection
doNotStartAtFirstMorningSectionIfHasAfte.description: Do not start at the first hour and keep the evening busy.

freeTimeAroundMidday.title: FreeTimeAroundMidday
freeTimeAroundMidday.description: Do not have less than a custom free time around noon pause.

dailyOcupation.title: DailyOcupation
dailyOcupation.description: Maximum and minimum values of teaching or activity time for teachers. This object indicates the type of condition (strict or weighting) and whether the automatic calculation in minutes in the engine should be set.

allowFreeDays.description: It indicates whether checking of minimums is omitted in the case of non-assigned days. Forbidden days are never checked.

minimumTeaching.title: MinimumTeaching
minimumTeaching.description: Minimum teaching time of the teacher with students.

maximumTeaching.title: MaximumTeaching
maximumTeaching.description: Maximun teaching time of the teacher with students.

minimumOccupancy.title: MinimumOccupancy
minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum teaching time of the teacher with students and other non-teaching activities indicated as eligible for calculation.

maximumOccupancy.title: MaximumOccupancy
maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum teaching time of the teacher with students and other non-teaching activities indicated as eligible for calculation.

middayReference.title: MiddayReference
middayReference.description: It indicate the frame where the teacher takes noon pause.

refFrame.description: Identifier of a frame where the teacher takes noon pause. If not specified, the engine shall take the noon pause of the frame with the highest allocation.

strict.description: It indicates whether the teacher's noon pause should be respected without placing his or her class units in sections of other frameworks that overlap with his or her noon pause.

dailyBuildingTransfers.title: DailyBuildingTransfers
dailyBuildingTransfers.description: Maximum number of movements between buildings that the teacher can make per day.

strict.description: Strict maximum number of movements per day.

preferable.description: Maximum number of movements per day that can be weighted/preferred.

refGroup.title: GroupReferenceType
refGroup.description: Contains the reference to a group of the session, and optionally, the number of students of the group that attend the session.

numStudents.description: Custom number of students that are in the class units. If it is not specified, the engine defaults to the value of the Group object.

stableTiming.title: StableTiming
stableTiming.description: It contains the fixed way of allocating time across the days of the period.

items.title: DailyMinutes
items.description: Indicates the number of minutes to be allocated on a given day.

variableTiming.title: VariableTiming
variableTiming.description: It defines the allocating time as a total of time, maximum and minimun range of sections per day.

avoidMaxDuration.description: It indicates the preference for class units of maximum duration.

avoidMinDuration.description: It indicates the preference for class units of minimun duration.

allowDiscontinuity.description: It indicates whether discontinuous sections are allowed, that is, having sections of other class units or breaks in between them.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: It contains information on how the class units of the session are distributed throughout the week. It must contain only one element between 'stablePeriods' and 'variablePeriods'.
distribution.$comment: The 'periods' property is required if there is more than one period in the timetable. The 'stablePeriods' and 'variablePeriods' properties are mutually exclusive.

periods.title: RefPeriods
periods.description: List of periods or weeks in which the class unit must be assigned.

stablePeriods.title: StablePeriods
stablePeriods.description: The allocation of the class unit of the session is the same in each period.
stablePeriods.$comment: Only one property must be specified.

stableTimingList.title: StableTimingList
stableTimingList.description: It contains an array of 'StableTiming' distributions.

variablePeriods.title: VariablePeriods
variablePeriods.description: The total of the class units of the distribution are allocation between the periods.

timing.title: TimeAllocation
timing.description: Contains the specification of how the total time must be allocated within the days of the framework and should be distributed across the period or periods.
timing.$comment: Only one property must be specified.

maximunTimeInPeriod.description: Maximum number of minutes to be allocated in each Period. If not defined, it is considered that there is no maximum limit.

minimnunTimeInPeriod.description: Minimum number of minutes to be allocated in each Period.

maximumTimeframe.description: Indicates the maximum interval of periods that can be used to assign the session, counting from the first period with a session assignment to the last period with a session assignment. That is, the periods in between are also considered even if they do not have a session assigned.

samePositionEveryPeriod.title: SamePositionEveryPeriod
samePositionEveryPeriod.description: Keep the same position every week or period for the class units.

refClassRoomToAssign.title: RefClassRoomToAssign
refClassRoomToAssign.description: Object, with classrooms and/or set of classrooms, where the engine should assign classroom to each class unit of the session.

classRoomsSetsList.title: ClassRoomsSetsList
classRoomsSetsList.description: Classroom set list where one classroom could be taken to assign to session.

computeForMaxMinOccupancy.description: It indicates whether the class unit counts for the maximum and minimum daily teacher occupancy. By default, the engine computes class units with students.
